caption.p: Extra-hepatic localisation of HEV. ( A) Localisation of HEV in lymphoid tissues, the gastrointestinal tract, lungs, kidneys, and nerve tissues. Brown colour indicates HEV. Nuclei were counterstained with Meyer’s haematoxylin. Scale bars = 25 μm. ( B) Time course of IHC grade for hepatic and extra-hepatic localization of HEV. HEV-infected cell proportions were scored as follows: − , none; 1, < 5% positive/total area (400 ×); 2, 5–10% positive/total area; 3, > 10% positive/total area. Data represent the mean of each group. DPI day post inoculation.
